= How to use =

See example here: http://www.wiquery.org/wiquery-examples-1.0/?wicket:bookmarkablePage=:org.odlabs.wiquery.examples.progressbar.ProgressBarPage

== XHTML ==

{{{
<div wicket:id="progressBar">
</div>
}}}

== Java ==

{{{
ProgressBar  progressBar = new ProgressBar("progressBar");
progressBar.setValue(0);
add(progressBar);
}}}
